title: Harbor Studio Oasis: A Pet-Friendly Retreat in Ustka Port District
description: Step into a beautifully presented studio—your serene escape by the sea. This thoughtfully designed 33 sqm apartment features an open-concept bedroom and living space, bathed in natural light from wide windows that capture a gentle coastal ambiance. Enjoy the privacy and convenience of a sleek, well-appointed bathroom. Ideal for embracing simplicity and modern comfort, with clever storage solutions to maximize functionality.
neighborhood_description: Nestled within Ustka's tranquil Port District, life balances casual coastal living with likable conveniences. Delight in local cafés, artisanal shops, and vibrant markets catering to daily essentials just steps away. The area's proximity to both the business zone and sweeping biker-friendly routes appeals to both active souls and professionals seeking sanctuary outside the bustling center.
lifestyle_benefits: direct access to scenic bike routes
ideal for pet walks along the waterfront
within reach of shopping and dining
target_buyer: Perfect for single professionals or creative souls who want a base by the coast, yet need pet-friendly amenities and fast connections into town or the business district.
market_positioning: An accessible, secure pied-à-terre in Ustka's evolving Port District—an area experiencing gentle growth, attracting buyers seeking poetic living near the water with great background conveniences like storage, security, and recreation.
